io.openhc.ohc.ui.view_pages

Class Page

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.openhc.ohc.ui.view_pages.Page
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Device, Login, Overview, Settings

    public abstract class Page
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic UI page. Common interface for all UI pages Allows modular UI design
    Author:
    Tobias Schramm
